Jim,
 While making copies for the Chicago shinsa,I notice an iron tsuba 
got the pinkie ........reason given was the inlays were added later.
Why is that ?  I mean if the soft metal inlays were added in the Edo 
days, it was " fashionable " then and not meant to deceive .
I recall that tsuba was a mumei.

milt
